name.ja: <ruby>真<rt>しん</rt></ruby><ruby>花<rt>か</rt></ruby><ruby>牙<rt>げ</rt></ruby><ruby>分<rt>ぶん</rt></ruby><ruby>身<rt>しん</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: If you have a face-up Level 7 EARTH Attribute Plant Type monster on your field, place 2 cards from your hand on the bottom of the Deck in any order.

effect.en: Special Summon up to 2 Level 7 EARTH Attribute Plant Type monsters from your Graveyard face-up to your field.
